about.me: 日本人オペーレーターが運営するX Stake Poolです。日本で約18年間システムエンジニア、WEB開発を行っております。I would like to introduce the X Stake Pool, a stake pool system run by a Japanese operator!I, the operator, have around eighteen years of experience working in system engineering and web development here in Japan.
about.server: VM terminal featuring a 6 core CPU, 16GB of RAM and a 400GB SSD.
